description_en:
Say goodbye to tangled hair with the **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush**.

Transform your daily hair routine with this innovative brush, bringing you closer to a smoother, more enjoyable combing experience. Featuring super-elastic bristles in five lengths, this tool swiftly and gently detangles your hair, minimizing breakage and preserving its structure. Feel the soothing scalp massage as the bristles stimulate blood circulation, leaving your hair softer and revitalized. Suitable for all hair types, the **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush** effortlessly tames both wet and dry hair, thanks to its ergonomic handle that ensures optimal comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush**:
â­ Hold the hairbrush firmly and gently brush through your hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to the roots.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo.
â­ Gently remove any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush**:
â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene
â­ Thermoplastic elastomer

#Killys #Hairbrush #TangleFree #HealthyHair #HairStyling #HairCare #SoftHair #ShinyHair #SaudiBeauty #HairGoals

Experience unparalleled convenience with the **Killys Mirror With Stand**, meticulously designed for ultimate flexibility in your daily routine.

â­ Crystal Clear Vision: The **Killys Mirror With Stand** provides a sharp, detailed reflection, perfect for makeup application, skincare routines, or a quick check-in.
â­ Effortlessly Adjustable Angles: Easily tilt and swivel the mirror to achieve your ideal viewing position, whether it's on your vanity or conveniently hung in your shower.
â­ Practical & Versatile Design: Its stable base allows placement on any flat surface, while the hanging option saves precious space, making it a stylish addition to any bathroom or dressing area.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Mirror With Stand**:
â­ Place on a stable, flat surface for optimal viewing.
â­ Clean the mirror surface with a soft, dry cloth.
â­ Utilize the hanging hook for space-saving convenience.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Mirror With Stand**:

â­ Durable Aluminum frame.

description_en:
Introducing the **Killys Cuticle Nippers With 5mm Blade - Autoclavable**, your go-to tool for perfectly manicured nails. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, these nippers feature a precise 5mm blade designed for clean and accurate trimming of cuticles around your nails, ensuring a professional finish every time.

â­ Made from durable stainless steel for longevity.
â­ Precision 5mm blade for expert cutting.
â­ Autoclavable for superior hygiene and sterilization.
â­ Includes a protective silicone cap for safe and sanitary storage.
â­ Ideal for both professional salon use and at-home manicures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Cuticle Nippers With 5mm Blade - Autoclavable**:
â­ Ensure your hands and cuticles are clean and dry before use.
â­ Hold the nippers comfortably in your dominant hand.
â­ Gently grasp excess cuticle or hangnail with the sharp blades, being careful not to pinch or cut surrounding skin.
â­ Trim with a smooth, precise motion, working carefully to avoid any nicks or irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Cuticle Nippers With 5mm Blade - Autoclavable**:
â­ Stainless Steel.
â­ Silicone Cap.

#NailCare #CuticleNippers #Manicure #Pedicure #Beauty #Nails #HealthyNails #Killys #SaudiBeauty #BeautyTools

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ø´Ø· Ù„ÙÙƒ Ø§Ù„ØªØ´Ø§Ø¨Ùƒ - Ù„ÙˆÙ† ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ Ø´ÙØ§Ù Ù…Ø¹ Ù…Ù‚Ø¨Ø¶
description_en:
Discover effortless hair styling with the **KillyS Detangling Comb**, meticulously designed to provide a tangle-free combing experience. The **KillyS** comb features a comfortable, profiled handle specifically engineered for a firm grip during use, making it an essential tool for all hair types. It's lightweight and durable, making it the perfect travel companion that you can slip into your bag without worrying about space or sturdiness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Detangling Comb**:
â­ Hold the comb firmly in your hands.
â­ Gently run it through your hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to detangle knots.
â­ To avoid split ends from towel-drying and rubbing, gently squeeze excess water out with your hands and wrap your hair in a cotton t-shirt to absorb water quickly.
â­ Clean the comb regularly with warm water and mild shampoo.
â­ Gently remove any trapped hair or product buildup.
â­ Store in a dry place away from direct sunlight to maintain its quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Detangling Comb**:
â­ POLISTYRENE

description_en:
Achieve perfectly manicured nails with the **KillyS Cuticle Trimmer And Nail File Set Mix Color**.

This practical manicure set is designed to give you a professional salon experience at home. It includes a precise cutter for the smooth removal of cuticles around the nail, featuring a protective cap for blade safety and hygienic storage. Alongside, you'll find a classic sapphire file, ideal for shortening natural nails with its 180 grit, shaping them to perfection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Cuticle Trimmer And Nail File Set Mix Color**:
â­ Soak hands to soften cuticles.
â­ Gently push back cuticles.
â­ Trim any excess with the cuticle trimmer.
â­ Shape your nails using the nail file.
â­ Buff edges to smooth them.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Clean tools after each use to maintain hygiene and longevity.
â­ Store the set in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Cuticle Trimmer And Nail File Set Mix Color**:
â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Stainless steel
â­ Carbon steel

#KillyS #NailCare #Manicure #Pedicure #NailFile #CuticleCare #BeautyTools #Skincare #NailGoals #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² ÙØ±Ø´ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ 6 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹ - Ù„Ù…Ø¸Ù‡Ø± Ù…ØªØ£Ù„Ù‚
description_en:
Achieve perfect lashes and brows with the **KillyS Eyelash And Eyebrow Brushes 6 Pcs** set. These practical brushes are designed for precise lash brushing and eyebrow styling, ideal for both natural and artificial lashes, especially after extension treatments. The spiral tip is made of high-quality synthetic bristles for optimal results.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ High-quality synthetic bristles for brushing and styling.
â­ Ideal for natural and artificial lashes post-extension.
â­ Practical design for ease of use.
â­ Contributes to a fresher and more vibrant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Eyelash And Eyebrow Brushes 6 Pcs**:
â­ Gently brush eyelashes and eyebrows using upward strokes to shape and groom.
â­ Start at the inner corner and work outward for even coverage.
â­ For eyebrows, comb through to tame and shape hairs into place.
â­ Avoid excessive pressure to prevent discomfort or damage.
â­ Clean brushes regularly with mild soap and water, then allow to air dry.
â­ Store in a clean, dry place to maintain hygiene and prolong lifespan.
â­ Replace if bristles become worn or damaged.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Eyelash And Eyebrow Brushes 6 Pcs**:
â­ NYLON
â­ POLISTYREN

description_en:
Discover elegance and practicality with the **KillyS Bubble Kabuki Retractable Brush** in captivating rose gold. This brush is the perfect addition to your makeup collection, inspired by the rainbow reflections of soap bubbles. It's meticulously designed for flawless application of both liquid and powder cosmetics. Its small, compact size makes it your ideal travel companion, easily fitting into any makeup bag. The **KillyS Bubble Kabuki Retractable Brush** features a closed aluminum tube, ensuring hygienic and safe storage for the brush bristles, protecting them from damage and contamination.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Bubble Kabuki Retractable Brush**:
â­ Swirl the brush lightly over your favorite powdered makeup (loose powder, pressed powder, or bronzer).
â­ To remove any excess product, gently tap the brush against the back of your hand.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Bubble Kabuki Retractable Brush**:
â­ ALUMINUM
â­ WOOD
â­ NYLON

description_en:
Discover unparalleled softness with the **KillyS Makeup Sponge Pastelove Collection Green Tea**. This non-latex sponge is infused with green tea powder, renowned for its soothing, antibacterial properties and rich antioxidants, making it gentle and safe for your skin. When moistened, the sponge becomes ultra-soft and pliable, specifically designed to contour and provide coverage for imperfections without absorbing cosmetics.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Makeup Sponge Pastelove Collection Green Tea**:
â­ Moisten the sponge with water and squeeze out excess water to make it softer and prevent makeup absorption.
â­ Use the flat, cut surface to pat cosmetics onto areas like the eyes, nose, ears, and forehead.
â­ The precise tip covers imperfections and applies foundation/corrector in hard-to-reach places.
â­ The rounded part is perfect for applying makeup to larger facial areas using gentle stamping motions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Makeup Sponge Pastelove Collection Green Tea**:
â­ Green tea extract.
â­ HYDROPHILIC POLYURETHANE.

#KillyS #MakeupSponge #GreenTea #SaudiMakeup #MakeupApplication #HealthySkin #BeautyTools #FullCoverage #SoftSkin #NaturalBeauty

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ø­Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù†Ø¬Ùˆ - Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙˆÙ„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±Ùƒ
description_en:
Revitalize your hair care routine with the **KillyS Hairbrush With Mango Scent**, specifically designed for gentle yet effective detangling. This brush features a flexible head and soft pins that adapt to your hair's contours, ensuring a pull-free and breakage-free brushing experience for both wet and dry hair. Enjoy a refreshing sensation with a long-lasting mango scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Hairbrush With Mango Scent**
â­ Ideal for both wet and dry hair, making your styling process easier and smoother.
â­ To tackle tangles, begin brushing from the ends and gradually work your way up to the roots.
â­ To maintain cleanliness, wash with warm water and a mild shampoo, gently removing any trapped hair or product residue.
â­ Allow the **KillyS Hairbrush With Mango Scent** to air dry completely before its next use.
â­ Store the brush in a clean, dry place to preserve its quality and fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Hairbrush With Mango Scent**
â­ Thermoplastic elastomer for flexibility and durability.

#KillySHairbrush #MangoScent #HairCare #SmoothHair #HealthyHair #HairStyling #BeautyTools #Hairbrush #SaudiBeauty #HairRoutine

description_en:
Introducing the **KillyS** Slanted Gold Tweezers, your ultimate tool for precise eyebrow shaping and hair removal. Elegantly designed in a radiant gold finish, these tweezers come complete with an additional storage case for convenience and protection. The perfectly profiled, slanted tip allows for the accurate capture of even the smallest, finest hairs, ensuring a flawless finish and helping you achieve the desired shape for your eyebrows with effortless precision.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS**:

â­ Hold the tweezers firmly between your thumb and index finger, grasping hairs as close to the root as possible.
â­ Pull swiftly and steadily in the direction of hair growth, utilizing a mirror for enhanced accuracy.
â­ Work slowly to avoid any unnecessary strain.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS**:

â­ High-quality stainless steel.
â­ Velvet material for the storage case.

#KillyS #Tweezers #EyebrowShaper #BeautyTools #Skincare #MakeupTools #GoldBeauty #PrecisionTweezers #BeautyEssentials #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing the **Killys Detangling Comb** in Transparent/Pink, your ultimate solution for a tangle-free hair experience. Its widely spaced comb teeth are expertly designed to perfectly apply hair treatments, such as masks and conditioners, onto wet hair for even and effective distribution. 

Lightweight, durable, and comfortable to use, its smoothed teeth ensure no damage to your hair structure.

â­ Effortlessly detangles hair without pulling or tugging.
â­ Widely spaced teeth aid in distributing masks and conditioners on wet hair.
â­ Lightweight, durable, and comfortable to hold.
â­ Smoothed teeth protect hair integrity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Detangling Comb**
â­ Start by separating small sections of hair.
â­ Gently comb through, starting from the ends and working your way up towards the roots.
â­ For hygienic reasons, remember to clean your comb with mild soap and water regularly.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Detangling Comb**
â­ POLISTYRENE

description_en:
Experience unparalleled smoothness with the **Killys Ovalo Hairbrush**, specifically designed to give you silken, healthier-looking hair. This brush combines soft pins and flexible bristles for maximum hair smoothing and everyday care.

â­ Flexible design with coarse bristles for deep smoothing.
â­ Comfortable, profiled handle for perfect grip during use.
â­ Scalp massage to improve circulation.
â­ Stimulates hair roots and prevents hair loss.
â­ Accelerates healthy hair growth.
â­ Soft, flexible nylon pins and gentle bristles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Ovalo Hairbrush**
â­ Use the brush on dry or damp hair to detangle and smooth your strands.
â­ Gently glide the brush from roots to ends for optimal results.
â­ Enjoy a soothing scalp massage while brushing to boost circulation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Ovalo Hairbrush**
â­ Soft, flexible nylon pins.
â­ High-quality bristles.
â­ Ergonomically designed comfortable handle.

description_en:
Experience elegance and effectiveness with the **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Straight Floralove Pink**. This classic nail file, featuring 180/240 grit, is designed to provide a perfect experience for shortening, shaping, and smoothing the edges of your natural nails. The playful floral design adds extra pleasure to your nail styling treatments.

â­ Ideal for trimming and shaping natural nails.
â­ 180/240 grit for superior smoothness.
â­ Stylish floral design adds a beautiful touch.
â­ Recommended for shortening brittle, thin, and delicate nails.
â­ Helps maintain nail health and strengthens them.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Straight Floralove Pink**:
â­ Choose the appropriate grit or coarseness based on your nail type and needs.
â­ Hold the file securely, positioning it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently file your nails in one direction, starting from the outer edge towards the center.
â­ Avoid a sawing motion to prevent splitting.
â­ Shape nails to your desired length and style, keeping them symmetrical.
â­ Smooth rough edges by buffing lightly.
â­ Use the finer side to refine and polish edges.
â­ Clean with a soft brush or damp cloth after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Straight Floralove Pink**:
â­ Ethylene
â­ Vinyl acetate
â­ Sandpaper
â­ Polypropylene

#NailFile #KillyS #NailCare #HealthyNails #Manicure #Pedicure #SaudiBeauty #HandCare #PinkNails #BeautyTools

description_en:
Achieve perfectly sculpted eyebrows with the **KillyS Eyebrow Razor With Double-Sided Cap For Eyebrows**. This innovative tool is designed for quick, easy, and painless removal of unwanted hair from your eyebrow area. It precisely trims and shapes your brows, helping you achieve a dream-like look and highlight your natural arches. The multifunctional protective cap, complete with a comb and brush, is your key to arranging your eyebrows into a flawless arch. It's also recommended for hair removal from small areas of the face and body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Eyebrow Razor With Double-Sided Cap For Eyebrows**:
â­ Ensure your skin is clean and dry before use.
â­ Hold the razor at a slight angle against the area you want to shape or remove hair from.
â­ With gentle, short strokes, carefully glide the razor in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Avoid applying too much pressure to prevent cuts or irritation.
â­ Rinse the razor blade frequently during use to remove hair and debris.
â­ After use, clean the razor with warm water and mild soap, then dry thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Eyebrow Razor With Double-Sided Cap For Eyebrows**:
â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Stainless steel

#EyebrowRazor #KillyS #PerfectBrows #BrowShaping #EyebrowGoals #BeautyTools #Skincare #Makeup #SaudiArabia #Beauty

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ù„Ù‚Ø· ØªØ¬Ù…ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù…Ø§Ø¦Ù„ ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ: Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø­Ø§Ø¬Ø¨ÙŠÙƒ
description_en:
Discover absolute precision with the **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Pink**. These slanted tweezers are designed to enable safe and highly accurate removal of even the finest hairs, thanks to their specially designed gripping surfaces. Made from high-quality stainless steel, the **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Pink** ensure swift and effortless removal of unwanted hair. Their ergonomic design, both in the tip and the handle, makes hair plucking a quick and hassle-free experience.

BEAUTY TIPS
â­ To quickly alleviate irritation after use, apply an ice cube wrapped in a handkerchief to the eyebrow arch. Swelling and redness will disappear in just a few moments.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Pink**
â­ Hold the tweezers firmly between your thumb and index finger, focusing on grasping hairs close to the root.
â­ Pull swiftly and firmly in the direction of hair growth, working slowly and using a mirror to ensure the highest level of precision.

Caution & Warnings
â­ Clean tools after each use to ensure their longevity and hygienic use.
â­ Store the tweezers in a dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Pink**
â­ High-quality stainless steel.

description_en:
Enhance your daily ritual with our innovative scented hairbrush, the **KillyS Hairbrush with Peach Scent**. Its flexible head and pins expertly brush both wet and dry hair, ensuring a gentle, pull-free experience for smooth, lustrous locks. Perfect for effectively tackling tangles, leaving your hair manageable and beautiful.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Hairbrush with Peach Scent**

â­ Versatile for use on both dry and wet hair.
â­ To tackle tangles, begin brushing from the ends, working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the **KillyS Hairbrush with Peach Scent** in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Hairbrush with Peach Scent**

â­ Thermoplastic elastomer.

description_en:
Discover precision and comfort with the **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Eyebrow & Eyeliner Brush**. This luxurious collection is inspired by colour and happiness, crafted from a passion for feminine beauty. The brush bristles are enriched with green tea powder, renowned for its soothing, antibacterial properties and wealth of antioxidants, offering a superior care experience during makeup application. Achieve precisely defined eyebrows and lower eyelids, and draw perfect eyeliner lines thanks to the carefully shaped bristles that ensure unparalleled comfort of use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Eyebrow & Eyeliner Brush**
â­ To accentuate eyebrows, use brush #06 to apply product and blend gently into the brows, tracing borders and filling in gaps between hairs.
â­ For eyeliner or eyeshadow application, use brush #07 for an intense smoky effect by blending shadow close to the lashes on upper and lower lids.
â­ To clean, use a mild brush cleaner or gentle soap with lukewarm water, massaging the bristles gently.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and reshape the bristles before allowing the brush to air dry completely.
â­ Repeat cleaning regularly for better hygiene and makeup application.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Eyebrow & Eyeliner Brush**
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ Nylon
â­ Green tea extract

description_en:
**Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush - Pink**: Designed for an unparalleled detangling experience. This innovative brush masterfully conforms to the contours of your head, enabling precise combing to effortlessly and comfortably work through knots. Its delicate, thin pins are perfect for detangling wet hair, and equally effective for evenly distributing hair masks and conditioners, ensuring maximum benefit from your treatments. The unique pass-through design allows for airflow, making cleaning the **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush - Pink** simple and ensuring exceptional hygiene with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush - Pink**
â­ Use on wet or dry hair.
â­ Ideal for evenly distributing hair treatments.
â­ Clean regularly with warm water and mild soap.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush - Pink**
â­ High-quality flexible bristles.
â­ Comfortable, non-slip handle.
â­ Durable design for daily use.

description_en:
Make your child's brushing routine a delightful experience with the **Killys Soft Touch Cat Ear Kids Hairbrush**. This modern hairbrush features an adorable cat ear design, bringing joy to everyday hair care. It's designed for ease of use and comfort, making it perfect for detangling long and medium-long hair. Elevate your child's hair care with this fun and functional brush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Soft Touch Cat Ear Kids Hairbrush**:
â­ Hold the hairbrush firmly and gently brush through your child's hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to the roots.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Soft Touch Cat Ear Kids Hairbrush**:
â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS)
â­ Gum
â­ Polypropylene

description_en:
Experience precision and professionalism with the **KillyS** Cuticle Nippers. Featuring precisely sharpened 3mm blades, they effortlessly trim cuticles and fine skin. Its handy, compact size makes it an essential tool for your nail care routine.

â­ Precisely sharpened 3mm blades for accurate trimming.
â­ Made of high-quality, durable stainless steel.
â­ Comfortable and compact design for ease of use.
â­ Autoclavable for maintaining the highest hygiene standards.

**BEAUTY TIPS:** For optimal results, follow the manicure order: shortening nails, soaking in a warm water bath with oils, cleansing, and then removing cuticles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS** Cuticle Nippers With 3 mm Blade Autoclavable:
â­ Ensure your hands and cuticles are clean and dry before use.
â­ Hold the nippers comfortably in your dominant hand.
â­ Gently grasp the excess cuticle or hangnail with the sharp blades of the nippers, being careful not to pinch or cut the surrounding skin.
â­ Trim the excess cuticle or hangnail with a smooth and precise motion, working carefully to avoid any cuts or irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS** Cuticle Nippers With 3 mm Blade Autoclavable:
â­ High-quality stainless steel.

title_ar: Ù…Ù‚Øµ Ø§Ù„Ø²ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø­Ù…ÙŠØ© ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² - Ø´ÙØ±Ø§Øª Ø¯Ù‚ÙŠÙ‚Ø© Ù…Ù†Ø­Ù†ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Experience precision and professionalism with **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel with a sleek glossy-matt finish, these scissors are specifically designed to make cuticle removal effortless. The sharp, curved blades offer superior accuracy, while the comfortable handles ensure ease of use, perfect for both professional salon settings and home manicures. **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors are autoclave sterilizable, guaranteeing the highest hygiene standards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors:
â­ Soften cuticles by soaking hands in warm, soapy water.
â­ Gently push back cuticles with a cuticle pusher.
â­ Hold scissors at a slight angle, ensuring curved blades face away from nail bed.
â­ Carefully trim excess cuticles or hangnails with small, precise cuts.
â­ Avoid cutting too close to the nail bed.
â­ Use a smooth, controlled motion, working one small section at a time.
â­ After trimming, moisturize cuticles with oil or lotion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors:
â­ STAINLESS STEEL.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with the **KillyS 3D Blending Sponge With Collagen Extract**. This soft, classic teardrop-shaped sponge is enriched with collagen extract, renowned for its ability to restore skin's firmness and elasticity, providing an anti-aging effect.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS 3D Blending Sponge With Collagen Extract**:
â­ Wet and squeeze the sponge thoroughly before use for optimal results.
â­ Apply foundation and concealer to the eye area and hard-to-reach places with the precision conical tip.
â­ Blend cosmetic products onto larger areas of the face using the rounded surface with a stamping motion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS 3D Blending Sponge With Collagen Extract**:
â­ Latex with active charcoal
â­ Cotton
â­ Collagen extract

Keep your makeup sponge clean and ready for use: wash it with gentle soap and water after each use, and allow it to air dry completely before storing. It's recommended to replace the sponge every few months to maintain optimal hygiene and ensure professional makeup application. Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø© Ø¯ÙØ¹ Ùˆ Ø¥Ø²Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø²ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù„Ø¯ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø²Ø¯ÙˆØ¬Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·Ø±Ø§Ù
description_en:
Discover precision and professionalism with the **KillyS 2-Sided Cuticle Pusher & Hybrid Remover**, the perfect tool for your nail care routine. This hybrid, dual-ended tool is designed for efficient and easy removal of hybrid nail polish, giving you clean and neat nails as if you were at a beauty salon. Crafted from durable, stain-resistant stainless steel, the **KillyS 2-Sided Cuticle Pusher & Hybrid Remover** ensures long-lasting use and rust resistance. Its ergonomic design with an anti-slip grip offers the accuracy and comfort you need during use, whether for professional salon use or everyday home application. The tool is suitable for sterilization, ensuring the highest hygiene standards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS 2-Sided Cuticle Pusher & Hybrid Remover**:
â­ Start by gently pushing back cuticles using the curved end, being careful not to apply too much pressure.
â­ Use the flat end to clean under the nails, gently lifting away any debris or buildup.
â­ For best results, use after soaking hands in warm, soapy water to soften the cuticles and nails.
â­ Clean tools thoroughly after each use to maintain hygiene and longevity.
â­ Store in a dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS 2-Sided Cuticle Pusher & Hybrid Remover**:
â­ High-quality stainless steel.

#KillyS #NailTools #NailCare #GelNails #Manicure #Pedicure #BeautySalon #NailTech #SaudiBeauty #ProfessionalNails

description_en:
Discover the **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush**, the perfect tool to style your hair with a touch of fun and elegance. This flexible brush is specifically designed to be gentle on your hair and scalp, reducing breakage and split ends.

â­ Features flexible bristles that adapt to your head shape.
â­ Lightweight design makes it easy to hold and use.
â­ Vibrant lime green color adds cheerfulness to your haircare arsenal.
â­ Ideal for detangling both wet and dry hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush**

â­ Start by gently detangling the lower ends of your hair.
â­ Gradually move upwards, focusing on tangled areas.
â­ Use the brush to evenly distribute hair styling products.
â­ Clean the brush regularly to remove loose hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Hair Brush**

â­ High-quality plastic bristles.
â­ Flexible and durable plastic handle.
â­ Eco-friendly design.

description_en:
Discover the magic of makeup with the **KillyS Bubble** Powder Blush & Bronzer Brush, expertly designed to give you a flawless finish. This delicate brush features fashionable pastel shades inspired by the rainbow reflections of soap bubbles, adding a touch of positive elegance to your beauty routine. Its obliquely profiled bristles precisely pick up product for defining and highlighting cheekbones, and sculpting facial contours with finesse, optically slimming your face.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Bubble**:
â­ Dip the brush into your powder blush or bronzer.
â­ Tap off any excess product.
â­ Sweep the brush gently over the apples of your cheeks for blush application, or along the contours of your face for bronzer.
â­ Blend the product using light, circular motions for a natural, seamless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Bubble**:
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ PBT - Polybutylene terephthalate

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ù„Ù‚Ø· ØªØ¬Ù…ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ Ù…Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø¨Ù†ÙØ³Ø¬ÙŠ: Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø­Ø§Ø¬Ø¨ÙŠÙƒ
description_en:
Experience perfect precision with the **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Violet**, specially designed for safe and effortless removal of even the finest hairs. The comfortable grip and precisely angled tip, crafted from high-quality stainless steel, ensure a firm and accurate hold, making eyebrow shaping and unwanted hair removal a hassle-free experience. These tweezers boast an elegant and durable design, guaranteeing exceptional performance and a long lifespan.

Quick Beauty Tips:
â­ To avoid irritation or redness after shaping your eyebrows, always ensure your **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Violet** and hands are thoroughly disinfected before use. This helps prevent the appearance of pimples or eczema.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Violet**:
â­ Hold the tweezers firmly between your thumb and index finger, grasping hairs close to the root.
â­ Pull the hair swiftly and firmly in the direction of its natural growth, using a mirror for maximum precision.
â­ Work slowly and gradually for the best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Cosmetic Slanted Tweezers Violet**:
â­ High-quality stainless steel, ensuring durability and rust resistance.
